message: My turn! How about this split? It's more than I offered you last round.
This is getting ridiculous. I'm offering a fair 50/50 split. Take it or leave it.
You're getting closer, but I can do better!
Okay, Alice.  This is me trying to be reasonable. This offer gives you more than half, but we're running out of time and I'm losing money with every round.
Don't worry, I'll be reasonable too... for now
